changeSet.sql: create table certificate ( id bigint auto_increment primary key, activity bit, name varchar(255) not null, description varchar(2000), horse_count int not null, duration double not null, photo_file varchar(255) not null, photographer_included bit not null, price decimal(19,2) not null, certificate_type_id bigint, constraint certificate_type_fk foreign key (certificate_type_id) references certificate_type (id) );
